website_summaries.verdict: Good for larger families, this grinder helps you make Indian chutneys, dosas, idlis and other delicacies with ease.
pros: Powerful 150 watt motor for better grinding
Ideal to grind flour for idli, dosa, urad, vada, dhokla, and more
Conical grinding stones generate less heat while grinding for soft, fluffy bread
Works like an electronic mortar and pestle
cons: May grind slowly, because of the conical grinding stones

customer_reviews.title: Handy table top wet grinder
customer_reviews.text: Shipping and packaging were perfect. We are using this grinder for 3 times in the last one month no issues. The quality of the grinder is not like the old ultra which we bought in 2000. The grinder locking mechanism (top) while grinding needs to be carefully handled chances are there it can break and you can't use the grinder without fixing it. It looks compact and elegant compared to the old wet grinder. It takes totally an hour for grinding urad dal and rice separately as you use more it might slow a bit.
customer_reviews.author: RV

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent grinder. However it takes twice as long to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent grinder. However it takes twice as long to grind than the Butterfly grinder I had earlier. I think this is because with two stones, this grinder has only two grinding surfaces. The 3-stone Butterfly grinder has four grinding surfaces (two between the bottom of the container and the two horizontal stones and two more between the conical top stone and the two horizontal stones).

customer_reviews.text: Extremely unhappy with the support provided by the vendor Gandhi appliances who shipped the product.
